TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapFrame extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public MustInherit Class BitmapFrame Inherits BitmapSource Implements IUriContext
public ref class BitmapFrame abstract : System::Windows::Media::Imaging::BitmapSource, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext

summary.span: 表示由解码器返回并被编码器接受的图像数据。

span.span: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供了未定义的其他功能通过提供对访问与特定帧的映像相关联。 provides additional functionality not defined by by providing access to the associated with a particular frame of an image. 此外通过使用支持的元数据信息编写属性或方法。 also supports the writing of metadata information by using the property or the method. 任何从返回解码器始终被冻结。Any returned from a decoder is always frozen. 如果你需要的可修改副本，必须首先创建一份使用方法。If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the by using the method. 仅[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]格式映像支持多个帧。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个新使用。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new by using a . [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#1)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象以打开[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]图和写入的元数据，通过使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bitmapStream`之后创建框架时，才可以关闭使用缓存选项。The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the cache option is used. 默认值缓存选项保留流，直至需要框架为止。The default cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed. 使用方法，以指定创建和缓存选项。Use the method to specify create and cache options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用缓存选项，如果你想要关闭`bitmapStream`创建位图后。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created. 默认值缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图和清理由垃圾回收器。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元数据仅可以添加或编辑使用如果图像文件包含足够的空间为新的元数据; 否则，元数据可以添加使用属性。Metadata can only be added or edited using the if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象以打开[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]图和写入的元数据，通过使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)]
